Cypher.name: Cypher
Cypher.lore: The Moroccan information broker, Cypher is a one-man surveillance network who keeps tabs on the enemy's every move. No secret is safe. No maneuver goes unseen. Cypher is always watching.

spells.name: Spycam
spells.description: EQUIP a spycam. FIRE to place the spycam at the targeted location. RE-USE this ability to take control of the camera's view. While in control of the camera,, FIRE to shoot a marking dart. This dart will reveal the location of any player struck by the dart.

spells.name: Trapwire
spells.description: EQUIP a trapwire. FIRE to place a destructible and covert tripwire at the targeted location, creating a line that spans between the placed location and the wall opposite. Enemy players who cross a tripwire will be tethered, revealed, and dazed after a short periof if they do not destroy the device in time. This ability can be picked up to be REDEPLOYED.

spells.name: Cyber Cage
spells.description: INSTANTLY toss the cyber cage in front of Cypher. ACTIVATE to create a zone that blocks vision and plays an audio cue when enemies pass through it.

spells.name: Neural Theft
spells.description: INSTANTLY use on a dead enemy player in your crosshairs to reveal the location of all loving enemy players.
